task.title: Turn on Electrical Power Supply to the Water Heater
task.shortdesc: This topic is a container topic used to hold variations of steps that describe how to turn on the power

step.cmd: Turn on the electrical disconnect switch.
Turn on the electrical supply to the water heater.
Turn on the electrical supply to place the water heater back in operation.
Turn on the electrical supply to place the water heater back in operation. See Initial Start Up.
